scripts.create-test-db: export $(cat .env | xargs) && CONTAINER_ID=$(docker ps --filter name="chess-db" --format "{{.ID}}") && docker exec -it $CONTAINER_ID mysql -uroot -p$DB_ROOT_PASSWORD -e "CREATE DATABASE ${DB_NAME}_test; GRANT ALL ON ${DB_NAME}_test.* TO 'user'@'%';"
scripts.init: npm run build-image:dev && npm run start && sleep 10 && npm run create-test-db
scripts.mysql: export $(cat .env | xargs) && CONTAINER_ID=$(docker ps --filter name="chess-db" --format "{{.ID}}") && docker exec -it $CONTAINER_ID mysql -u$DB_USER -p$DB_PASSWORD $DB_NAME
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.ssh: CONTAINER_ID=$(docker ps --filter name="chess-app" --format "{{.ID}}") && docker exec -it $CONTAINER_ID sh
scripts.test: CONTAINER_ID=$(docker ps --filter name="chess-app" --format "{{.ID}}") && docker exec -it $CONTAINER_ID npm run local-test
scripts.test:coverage: CONTAINER_ID=$(docker ps --filter name="chess-app" --format "{{.ID}}") && docker exec -it $CONTAINER_ID npm run local-test:coverage
